altTitles.ja: むげんのじゅにん
無限の住人

description.en:
"To end his eternal suffering, he must slay one thousand enemies!" Manji, a ronin warrior of feudal Japan, has been cursed with immortality. To rid himself of this curse and end his life of misery, he must slay one thousand evil men! His quest begins when a young girl seeks his help in taking revenge on her parents' killers… and his quest won't end until the blood of a thousand has spilled!  

[Official English](https://digital.darkhorse.com/series/373/blade-of-the-immortal)
 
--- 
- **Won the 1st Japan Media Arts Award Division Excellence Prize**

---
  
AnimeNewsNetwork Links:  
[Anime](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=9691)  
[Live-Action Movie](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18861)
description.es: Asano Rin, una chica que jura vengarse de los Itto Ryu, un grupo de espadachines que mataron a su padre y secuestraron a su madre, contrata a Manji, un espadachín conocido como los "El asesino de los 100" y que tiene un cuerpo inmortal gracias a un parásito llamado bicho Kessenchu, como su guardián y comienza un viaje para perseguir al líder de los Itto Ryu. Comienza un viaje en busca de su archienemigo, Amatsu Kagehisa, el líder de la escuela Itto.
description.ja: 父を殺し、母を攫（さら）った剣客集団『逸刀流（いっとうりゅう）』に復讐を誓う少女・浅野 凜（あさのりん）は、「百人斬り」の異名を持ち、己の身体に血仙蟲（けっせんちゅう）という虫を寄生させることで不死の肉体を持った剣士・万次（まんじ）を用心棒として雇い、逸刀流の統主である宿敵・天津影久（あのつかげひさ）を追う旅を始める――。
description.es-la: Asano Rin, una chica que jura vengarse de los Itto Ryu, un grupo de espadachines que mataron a su padre y secuestraron a su madre, contrata a Manji, un espadachín conocido como los "El asesino de los 100" y que tiene un cuerpo inmortal gracias a un parásito llamado bicho Kessenchu, como su guardián y comienza un viaje para perseguir al líder de los Itto Ryu. Comienza un viaje en busca de su archienemigo, Amatsu Kagehisa, el líder de la escuela Itto.
description.pt-br: Manji é um espadachim imortal, que foi amaldiçoado com a vida eterna. Ele cresceu cansado de viver com toda a morte que ele criou. Ele não tem outras habilidades, a não ser as que trazem a morte, assim ele faz um plano para recuperar sua mortalidade: ele deve matar cem homens maus para cada homem bom que ele matou. A velha bruxa que amaldiçoou Manji com a imortalidade se compromete a tirá-la de Manji por tal condição, e para isso ele terá que matar mil homens maus. Em sua jornada, ele conhece uma jovem garota, Rin, que tem a sua própria vingança contra a procurar a escola de espadachins cujos membros mataram a família Rin. Rin e Manji entram junto numa jornada, cada um com a esperança de encontrar algum tipo de paz. Em seu caminho muitos inimigos aparecem, Rin e Manji estão quase constantemente sob ataque e devem aprender a viver suas vidas, evitando serem consumidos pela vingança.

altTitles.ja: セブンス

description.en:
Lyle Walt is a young noble boy and heir looking forward to the day he can inherit his family’s territory. Except around when he was 10 year old, his parents started neglecting him more and more in favour of his little sister, Ceres.

On his fifteenth birthday, he is challenged to a duel by his sister to see who will inherit the household and horribly loses, being cast out of his family. Afterwards, he gets treated by the family groundskeepers and receives the family heirloom Gem from him that Lyle’s grandfather had entrusted to him. From there, he begins an aimless journey with his childhood friend and former fiancée, Novem, and the Gem-turned-Jewel that houses the memories, personalities, and Skills of seven of his ancestors.
description.ja:
自身の家族に裏切られ、失意のライエルの前に現れた七人の先祖達…彼らは敵か味方か！？宝玉をめぐる剣と魔法のバトルロワイヤル！！

女神を崇め、剣と魔法が存在する世界で貴族の嫡男として生まれたライエル。過去には天才、麒麟児ともてはやされ期待されたライエルだが、すべてを完璧にこなす妹セレスによって屋敷内で冷遇されていってしまう。そのセレスに思いついたかのようにライエルとの戦いを提案され、セレスと対峙すことになったライエル。全てが上をいくセレスに無様に敗れたライエルは、跡取りの座をセレスに奪われ存在そのものも失われてしまう。傷つき失意したライエルだったが、屋敷の庭に住み込む老人に助けられ、宝玉のついた首飾りを受け取る。それは老人が先代─ライエルの祖父から預かっていた、【アーツ】が記録された青い玉は、ウォルト家の家宝とも言うべき物だった。 歴代当主七人のアーツが記録された宝玉を託されたライエルは、それを持って屋敷を去るのだった。

altTitles.en: The Maid Who Can't Hide Her Feelings (Serialization)

altTitles.ja: メイカさんは押しころせない

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada Que Não Consegue Esconder Seus Sentimentos (Serialização)

description.en: A serialization of the webcomic about a maid, Meika, who can't completely suppress her feelings for her master, Kouta.
description.vi: Một câu chuyện kể về một cô hầu gái, Meika, người không thể kìm nén hoàn toàn tình cảm của mình dành cho chủ nhân của cô ấy, Kouta.
description.es-la: Una serialización del webcomic sobre una maid, Meika, quien no puede reprimir por completo sus sentimientos por su amo, Kouta.
description.pt-br: A serialização da webcomic sobre uma empregada, Meika, que não consegue ocultar completamente seus sentimentos pelo seu mestre, Kouta.

description.en:
Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.fr:
"Quel est le métier le plus utile pour survivre dans un monde en ruine ?". Cette question apparaît devant Seong-woo alors qu'il somnole en cours. Lui et les autres étudiants ont 15 secondes pour choisir une carte parmi celles qui sont apparues devant eux. Celle choisie déterminera leurs pouvoirs qui leur permettront de survivre dans un monde chaotique, qui ressemble fortement à un jeu vidéo. Pour sa part, Seong-woo sera un nécromancien !

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

description.id:
Pekerjaan apa yang akan kau pilih untuk bertahan hidup saat dunia hancur oleh monster-monster yang tiba-tiba bermunculan?! Setelah memilih 'Necromancer' sebagai pekerjaannnya, Sungwoo dapat menjadikan monster yang telah ia kalahkan menjadi pengikutnya!

description.ko:
곧 세상이 멸망한다.
전설 속에나 나올 법한 몬스터들이 각지에 출현한다.
그리고 사람들을 잡아먹고, 길거리를 점령하며, 빌딩과 지하철에 던전을 만들기 시작한다.

멸망한 세계에서 살아남기 위해 단 한 가지 직업을 고를 수 있다.
당신은 무슨 직업을 고르겠는가?
"네크로맨서"

나에게는 멸망이 무대이고, 죽음이 자산이 된다.

---

description.ru:
Мир на грани разрушения. Существа, упоминания о которых встречались лишь в мифах и легендах, теперь заполоняют города, обживаются под людскими жилищами и в метро, пожирая всё живое.
А что до человечества… Ему будет предложено занять новую роль в нынешнем мире выживания.
Сонву выбрал класс «некромант», и теперь трупы, что обагряют Землю, ему только на руку.

---

description.zh:
魔物侵袭，世界灭亡在即！
退役特种兵的降维打击！
某一天，只存在于传说中的魔物们突然出现，肆意地破坏街道、撕咬人类，并且在高楼和地铁建立起了自己的巢穴…如果在灭亡的世界，能够选择一个职业，你会选择哪种职业呢？对于身为“死灵法师”的刘成宇来说，灭亡即是舞台，丧生即为资产。

altTitles.ja: レッドブルー

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

altTitles.ja: 義妹生活

description.en:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.
description.pt-br:
De colegas de classe a irmão e irmã, vivendo sob o mesmo teto.

Após o novo casamento de seu pai, Asamura Yuuta acaba ganhando uma nova meia-irmã, coincidentemente a beleza número um do ano escolar, Ayase Saki. Tendo aprendido valores importantes no que diz respeito aos relacionamentos homem-mulher através dos anteriores de seus pais, eles prometem um ao outro não ser muito próximos, não ser muito opostos e apenas manter uma distância vaga e confortável.

Por um lado, Saki, que trabalhou sozinha pelo bem de sua família, não sabe como confiar adequadamente nos outros, enquanto Yuta não tem certeza de como realmente tratá-la. Estando em terreno bastante igual, os dois aprendem lentamente a sensação confortável de viver juntos.

O relacionamento deles evolui lentamente de estranhos à medida que os dias passam. Eventualmente, isso pode acabar em uma história sobre o amor, pelo que sabemos.

title.en: Chounin A wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Doushitemo Sukuitai

altTitles.ja: 町人Aは悪役令嬢をどうしても救いたい～どぶと空と氷の姫君～

altTitles.en: Villager A Wants to Save the Villainess no Matter What!

altTitles.ru: Крестьянин хочет спасти злодейку любой ценой!

altTitles.vi: Dù là phản diện những tôi vẫn muốn giúp cô ấy

altTitles.id: Penduduk Desa A Ingin Menyelamatkan Tokoh Antagonis Apapun yang Terjadi!

altTitles.pt-br: O Camponês A Quer Salvar a Vilã a Qualquer Custo!

description.en:
Allen, an eight-year-old boy from a poor family in the royal capital, is living a poor but happy life together with his mother. One day, however, memories of his previous life suddenly come back to him and he remembers that he is in an dating sim game and that the capital will be destroyed by war if he doesn’t do something about it. If this continues, both he and his mother will be killed! 

With a sense of urgency, he decides to rise to the occasion in order to save his precious mother’s life and save his favorite character, the villainous young lady Anastasia, the only girl he liked in the game, from her all too tragic and ruinous end.

This is the story of a man who isn’t even a character in the game, but who strives with his steely determination and uses all the knowledge he has to turn overcome fate!
description.ja: モブ以下"町人A"、家族のために悪役令嬢を救う⁉ 乙女ゲーム世界にモブ以下の存在として転生したアレン。記憶を取り戻し、数年後にヒロインのせいで街ごと蹂躙され、自分も家族も滅んでしまう!と気づき一念発起。前世のゲーム知識(チート)を駆使して成り上がることに。どぶさらいなど地道な努力とチートの結果Cランク冒険者となり、いよいよ学園入学――本来ならば学園に入ることも許されない町人Aに悪役令嬢は救えるのか?ヒロイン対町人Aの戦いがスタート!第2回アース・スターノベル大賞、佳作受賞作待望の書籍化
description.ru:
Аллен, восьмилетний мальчик из бедной семьи в королевской столице, живет бедной, но счастливой жизнью вместе со своей матерью. Однако однажды к нему внезапно возвращаются воспоминания о его прошлой жизни, и он вспоминает, что находится в симуляторе свиданий и что столица будет разрушена войной, если он ничего с этим не сделает.

Если так будет продолжаться, и он, и его мать будут убиты!

С чувством срочности он решает воспользоваться случаем, чтобы спасти жизнь своей драгоценной матери и спасти своего любимого персонажа, злодейскую юную леди Анастасию, единственную девушку, которая ему нравилась в игре, от ее слишком трагического и разрушительного конца.

Это история человека, который даже не является персонажем игры, но который борется со своей стальной решимостью и использует все имеющиеся у него знания, чтобы повернуть судьбу вспять!
description.vi:
Allen, 8 tuổi, sống trong một hoàn cảnh nghèo khó nhưng hạnh phúc với mẹ của mình. Một hôm nọ, ký ức tiền kiếp quay về. Thế giới này thực ra là một game giả lập hẹn hò và nơi cậu sống sẽ bị hủy diệt nếu như cậu không làm gì đó

Thế nên cậu quyết định giúp đỡ nữ phản diện trong game để cứu lấy cô khỏi kết thảm và cũng để cứu mẹ của mình

Đây là một câu chuyện về một nhân vật thậm chí chẳng tồn tại trong game, trên con đường lật kèo bằng ý chí và kiến thức của mình!
description.pt-br: Allen, um garoto de oito anos de uma família pobre na capital real, vive uma vida simples, mas feliz, junto com sua mãe. Um dia, no entanto, memórias de sua vida anterior subitamente voltam, e ele se lembra de que está em um jogo de simulação de encontros e que a capital será destruída pela guerra se ele não fizer algo para impedir. Se isso acontecer, ele e sua mãe serão mortos! Com um senso de urgência, Allen decide enfrentar a situação para salvar a vida preciosa de sua mãe e resgatar sua personagem favorita, a jovem vilã Anastasia, a única garota de quem ele gostava no jogo, de um final trágico e arruinador. Esta é a história de um homem que nem é um personagem do jogo, mas que se esforça com uma determinação de ferro e usa todo o conhecimento que tem para superar o destino!

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん
Hiiragi-san is a little careless.

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.ja: 戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ

description.en:
This story takes place in a world made up of floating islands of various sizes, where two types of races, "Caninu" and "Felineko" live.

Malt, a caninu boy, lives peacefully with his younger sister Mei on their grandparents' farm in the remote village of Petit Mona. One day, their village is suddenly attacked by the Berman Empire, and is burnt to the ground overnight. "How could something like this happen..." Malt and his friends were confused, then a mysterious voice called out from the radio...! ?

A group of children caught in the flames of war ride the mysterious giant tank ``Taranis'' and fight to save their families!
description.ja:
子どもたちは戦火の中、復讐を誓うー

“戦争×復讐×ケモノ”をテーマにしたドラマティックシュミレーションRPG『戦場のフーガ』の公式コミカライズ作品『戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ』！漫画執筆は足立たかふみ氏（代表作：『D・Mファイター焔』や『メタルファイト ベイブレード』など）が担当。

＜あらすじ＞
「イヌヒト」と「ネコヒト」という2種類の種族が暮らす、大小様々な浮島からなる世界――浮遊大陸。
イヌヒトの少年マルトは、辺境にあるプチ・モナ村でヒツウシ飼いをしながら妹のメイと穏やかに暮らしていた。ある日突然、北東の国「ベルマン帝国」から村が襲撃され、一夜にして戦火に焼け落ちる。どうしてこんなことに……混乱するマルトたちにラジオから謎の声が―――！？

戦火に巻き込まれたこどもたちは連れ去られた家族を取り戻すため、謎の巨大戦車『タラニス』に乗り込む！

単行本だけの付録として足立たかふみ氏の設定画やゲームソフト『戦場のフーガ』総監督であり株式会社サイバーコネクトツー代表取締役 松山洋による開発ブログも収録。

description.en: The whole company knew that they they were polar opposites who fought like cats and dogs. Yet during the year-end party, the wall between them shattered after they got drunk! And so the two of them went from always being close to going off on each other to feeling very strange things following the accidental mishap...
description.ru: Они несовместимы, и их отношения – настоящее поле боя, о чём знают все в компании. Но на ежегодном корпоративе, после пары стаканов, лёд был сломан! У двух девушек, которые в прошлом были как кошка с собакой, возникло странное чувство из-за некой неоднозначной оплошности...

altTitles.ja: 渚のサーメイド

altTitles.es-la: La Maid Tiburón de la Costa

description.en:
Wataru is a lonely boy who lost his parents in an accident. For some reason, there is one maid—her name is Kosame, and she has been by his side since he was little. Yes, she never changed... Set in a unique coastal fishing village with rows of houses called "boathouses," a love story of eternal love begins! (MTL)

---
**Links:**  
- Alternative Official Raw - [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM05203826010000_68) and [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62407)
description.ja: 事故で両親を亡くした天涯孤独な少年のワタル。そんな彼と何故かともに暮らす親代わりのメイドさんがひとり。彼女の名前はこさめといい、ワタルが小さなころからずっと変わらずそばにいる。そう、姿も変わらずずっと……。
description.es-la:
Wataru es un chico solitario que perdió a sus padres en un accidente. Por alguna razón tiene una maid que comienza a vivir con él en lugar de sus padres. Su nombre es Kosame y siempre ha estado al lado de Wataru desde que este era pequeño. Y sí, siempre ha tenido el mismo aspecto… 
Ambientada en un pueblo pesquero con hileras de casas llamadas Funaya, ¡Aquí es donde comienza esta historia de amor y persecución por el “Amor Eterno”!

description.en:
Long, long ago in Neraland, the pious human built a great tower to show the respect to their Goddess Nera.  
Goddess Nera was deeply moved by human piety; to reward them, she opened a door at the top of the tower. This ethereal door connected to another world; it was known as *Heaven's Eye*.  
However…
description.fr:
Il y a fort longtemps au royaume de Nera, les fidèles humains érigèrent une tour en signe de leur respect pour leur déesse Nera.  
La déesse Nera, profondément touchée par la foi de ces derniers, ouvrit une porte au sommet de la tour pour les récompenser. Cette porte mystique était connectée à un autre monde. Elle fut dénommée *l'Œil céleste*.  
Mais un jour…
description.uk:
Давним-давно в Нераланді благочестиві люди побудували велику вежу, в знак поваги до своєї богині Нери.   
Богиня Нера була глибоко зворушена людським благочестям; щоб нагородити їх, вона відчинила двері на верхівці вежі. Ці ефірні двері пов'язані з іншим світом; І були відомі як *Райське Око*.  
Однак…  


---
description.zh: 很久以前，诺拉大陆的人类为了表示对诺拉女神最崇高的敬意，筑起了一座宏伟的高塔。 女神为人们的虔诚所动， 在高塔的顶端打开了一扇通往异世的大门。 来自另一个世界的羽族人为人类带来了文明与进步，但最终两族人在各种矛盾下刀戈相向。 战后数百年过去了，大陆再一次笼罩在不安与诡异的阴云中...
description.pt-br:
Há muito, muito tempo atrás em Neraland, o piedoso humano construiu uma grande torre para mostrar o respeito à sua deusa Nera.

Deusa Nera ficou comovida pela piedade humana; para recompensá-los, ela abriu uma porta no topo da torre. Esta porta etérea conectada a outro mundo; era conhecida como "Olho do Paraíso". 

 Contudo...

altTitles.ja: R15＋じゃダメですか？

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she's a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it's not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie...?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amo, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amo sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?
description.pt-br:
O que devo fazer para me tornar uma adulta?

Akane Amou, que cresceu com seus pais proibindo qualquer tipo de entretenimento, é um pouco ruim com coisas "estimulantes", até o ponto de não conseguir assistir a uma cena de beijo em um drama. Agora que ela é estudante do ensino médio, ela quer de alguma forma superá-lo! Essas são suas intenções, mas não é tão fácil. Enquanto isso, ela se familiarizou com um filme otaku chamado Fuyumine. Será que ela será capaz de assistir um filme R15...?

altTitles.ja: 悪霊 シュトヘル

description.en:
Beginning of the 13th century, Western Xia state in Chinese mainland. 
In those days existed a woman warrior named Shut Hell, the Evil One, feared even by the Mongols, reputed the strongest army in history. 
At first she was just a normal Tangut soldier, but after coming close to death so many times she found a superhuman strength in herself. 
On the other side Yurul, a young Mongol prince, is fascinated by the Tangut, his enemies' writing script, and is worried for their future…
Centuries later a Japanese high school student named Shudo is haunted by a vivid dream of a battlefield...
Is there some sort of bound between these completely different lives ? Will they manage to overcome the obstacles surrounding them ?


- **2012 Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize (New Creator) winner**
description.pt-br: Um Jovem chamado Sudou desperta em uma de suas vidas passadas onde ele era uma guerreira Xia chamada Shut Hell a maligna, temida até pelos Mongóis de Genghis Khan que estão unindo forças para acabar com a dinastia Xia Ocidental. a história ocorre no Século 13 onde a Maligna junto com a principe Yurul se esforçam para preservar Xia e sua cultura e escritas.

However, she was attacked by a neighboring country, her land taken away, and her family was brutally killed. The surviving Evita was sold to a brothel and lived as a prostitute. In the middle off all this, a man from the royal family that she hates appears as a customer...

Joonwoo hates school and has trouble making friends. The only time he's happy is when he's talking to strangers on the Random Chatting phone app. That's how Joonwoo ends up befriending a girl on RanChat who turns out to be his classmate Sungah but she has no idea about it! Will Joonwoo be able to fight his social anxiety and become closer to her in real life?

description.en: A young woman visits a seaside town. Even though it's her first time there, everything seems strangely nostalgic. Somehow she ends up working at an empty little shop serving the local customers. But what will she discover in this strange town that carries the scent of the sea ?

altTitles.ja: バナナフィッシュ

description.en: Nature made Ash Lynx beautiful; nurture made him a cold ruthless killer. A runaway brought up as the adopted heir and sex toy of "Papa" Dino Golzine, Ash, now at the rebellious age of seventeen, forsakes the kingdom held out by the devil who raised him. But the hideous secret that drove Ash's older brother mad in Vietnam has suddenly fallen into Papa's insatiably ambitious hands—and it's exactly the wrong time for Eiji Okamura, a pure-hearted young photographer from Japan, to make Ash Lynx's acquaintance…
description.tr: Tanrı, Ash Lynx’i güzeller güzeli bir çocuk olarak yarattı; dünya onu soğukkanlı acımasız bir katil haline getirdi. Çocuk yaşta evden kaçan Ash, “Baba” Dino Golzine tarafından bulunur ve hem mafyanın varisi olarak hem de Golzine’nin şahsi zevklerini tatmin etmek üzere yetiştirilir. Şimdi 17 yaşında isyankar bir genç olan Ash kendisini yetiştiren şeytanın ona sunduğu krallığa sırtını döner. Ancak Ash’in ağabeyinin Vietnam’da aklını yitirmesine sebep olan korkunç sır, hırsı dur durak bilmeyen Golzine’nin ellerine düşmüştür. İşte tam bu sırada genç bir fotoğrafçı Japonya’dan New York’a gelir. Temiz kalpli Eiji Okumura ve Ash Lynx olabilecek en talihsiz zamanda karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: A natureza fez Ash Lynx um cara bonito; mas o tempo fez dele um assassino cruel e frívolo. Uma criança fugitiva criada como um herdeiro adotado, um guerreiro treinado, e o brinquedo sexual de seu “Papa”, Dino Golzine, o senhor do crime da Costa do Oeste Oriental. Ash está agora na idade rebelde dos dezessete anos – abandonando o reino de poder e riqueza, realizada pelo demônio que o ressuscitou, preferindo um código para viver entre um pequeno, mas fiel, gangue de bandidos de rua. Porém, “Papa” não pode simplesmente deixá-lo ir. Não quando descobre que o segredo que levou o irmão mais velho de Ash a loucura, no Vietnã, poderá cair em suas mãos insaciavelmente ambiciosas. É exatamente o momento errado para Eiji Okamura, um jovem fotógrafo do Japão, de coração puro, chegar em Nova York e travar conhecimento de Ash Lynx… e ao seu lado, ser atraído para dentro de um redemoinho sangrento de orgulho, ganância, luxúria e ira desencadeada pelo enigma de codinome Banana Fish.

altTitles.zh: 为美好的世界献上祝福！

description.en: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
description.es:
Kazuma Sato es un hikikomori que disfruta como un bellaco con los videojuegos, el manga y el anime. Un día decide salir de su casa, sufre un desafortunado accidente y fallece. Cuál es su sorpresa al ver que aparece en un limbo junto a una diosa llamada Aqua que le ofrece enviarlo a un nuevo mundo con tintes roleros y -además- concederle un deseo. Pero antes, Aqua se ocupa de humillarlo porque la muerte que él pensaba que había sido heroica salvando a una chica de ser atropellada, resulta ser lo más patética y cutre que te puedas echar a la cara. Lo único que se le ocurre al bueno de Kazuma es usar su deseo para que Aqua lo acompañe al nuevo mundo y se una a él en sus peripecias para derrotar al Rey Demonio.

En su nueva aventura encontrará una gran variedad de personajes a cada cual más cazurro, formando equipo con la pesada de Aqua, con Megumin, una maga loca por las explosiones y con Darkness, una paladín aficionada al sadomasoquismo. Viendo que su equipo está mal de la cabeza y que todas son más tontas que un zapato, Kazuma decide disfrutar de su nueva vida a lo grande, pero al final se las tendrá que ver con los generales del Rey Demonio que se cruzarán en su camino… y con sapos, un montón de babosos batracios.
description.ru: Кадзума Сато - хиккикомори, закоренелый фанат игр, аниме и манги. В какой-то момент, в попытке спасти человека он попадает в дорожную катастрофу и его жизнь обрывается. Казалось бы жизнь закончилась? Но Кадзума просыпается и видит перед собой красавицу, которая называет себя богиней. Она спрашивает, хочет ли он отправиться в другой мир? С условием, что он может взять с собой только одну вещь. Кадзума сразу же желает взять с собой богиню. Так и начинается его невероятное приключение против короля демонов, но перед этим нужно заняться другими делами. Например, найти пищу, одежду и убежище. Кадзума хочет жить в мире и спокойствия, но богиня находит одну проблему за другой. А кроме того, армия демонов имеет какие-то свои виды на него.
description.pt-br: A vida de Satou Kazuma, um hikikomori que gosta de jogos, muito em breve chegou ao fim por causa de um acidente de trânsito... Deveria ser, mas quando ele acorda, uma linda deusa aparece diante de seus olhos. "Ei, eu tenho algo um pouco agradável para você. Quer ir para outro mundo? Você pode desejar apenas uma coisa de sua escolha junto com você." "Então eu irei levá-la." Daqui em diante, a grande aventura de subjugar o Rei Demônio começará para Kazuma reencarnado, ou assim se poderia pensar, mas é o trabalho para a obter alimentos, roupas e abrigo começa! Apesar de Kazuma querer viver em paz, a deusa acaba causando problemas, um após outro, e eventualmente, eles atraem a atenção do exército do Rei Demônio.

description.en:
Kang Jihyoung,wanted to become a hunter for his mother.

However, his bullies put his mother into a vegetative state. He tried to take revenge but was thoroughly crushed and trapped...

The boy who lost everything became a beast and began his hunt.
description.ko: 엄마를 위해 헌터가 되려 했던 주인공 지형. 그러나 일진들이 엄마를 식물인간으로 만든다. 복수하려 했지만, 철저히 부서지고 갇히는데… 모든 걸 잃은 소년은 마수가 되어 사냥을 시작한다.

title.en: The Demon King Who Lost His Job

altTitles.pt-br: O rei demônio que perdeu o emprego

description.en: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.
description.pt-br: Ele é o Rei Demônio que sofreu impeachment. Ela é a corajosa heroína que foi demitida por causa de uma expedição fracassada. Presos pelo destino, os dois embarcam em uma aventura para pagar suas dívidas.

description.en:
Eight hundred years ago, the pure-blooded and noble Crown Prince, Xie Lian, was a well-regarded child of heaven with unlimited boundaries. However, who knew that after ascending, achieving immortality and becoming a Martial God that thousands of people worshipped, that his life would only go downhill. He was demoted and fell down the ranks until he reached rock bottom.  
  
Eight hundred years later, Xie Lian has ascended once again, but this time he has neither the followers nor any incense burned in his name. One day, on his way back from collecting trash, he picks up a mysterious youth and takes him home. This particular youth however, actually turns out to be Hua Cheng, the infamous Ghost King known throughout the three realms who could change both his gender and appearance at the flip of a dime.  
  
NOTE: Heaven Official's Blessing has been re-released on bilibili from the prologue with some special extras due to the original release not being very coherent unless you've read its source material (novel). This is the new version.
description.id:
Delapan ratus tahun yang lalu, Putra Mahkota berdarah murni dan mulia, Xie Lian, adalah anak surga yang dihormati dengan batas yang tidak terbatas. Namun, siapa yang tahu bahwa setelah naik, mencapai keabadian dan menjadi Dewa Perang yang disembah ribuan orang, bahwa hidupnya hanya akan menurun. Dia diturunkan dan peringkatnya menurun sampai mencapai titik terendah.  
  
Delapan ratus tahun kemudian, Xie Lian telah naik sekali lagi, tetapi kali ini ia tidak memiliki pengikut atau dupa yang terbakar dalam namanya. Suatu hari, dalam perjalanan kembali dari mengumpulkan sampah, ia bertemu seorang pemuda misterius dan membawanya pulang. Namun pemuda khusus ini, ternyata adalah Hua Cheng, Raja Iblis yang terkenal di tiga alam yang dapat mengubah jenis kelamin dan penampilannya dengan cepat.
description.pl:
Osiemset lat temu czystokrwisty i szlachetny Książę Koronny, Xie Lian, był wysoce poważanym dzieckiem Niebios z nieograniczonymi możliwościami. Jednak kto by się spodziewał, że po wzniesieniu się do Niebios, osiągnięciu nieśmiertelności i zostaniu Bogiem Wojny, którego czciły tysiące, jego życie całkiem się rozpadnie. Został wygnany, aż osiągnął dno.
Osiemset lat później Xie Lian znowu wzniósł się do Niebios, ale tym razem nie miał ani popleczników, ani nikt nie palił w jego imieniu kadzidła. Pewnego dnia, wracając z kolejnego dnia spędzonego na zbieraniu złomu, spotkał tajemniczego młodzieńca i zabrał go do domu. Ten okazał się być Hua Chengiem, Królem Demonów cieszącym się złą opinią we wszystkich trzech wymiarach.

description.en:
In the world, the manipulation of tanks (Sensha-do) is one of the traditional martial arts especially for girls. Miho doesn't like Sensha-do and moves to Oarai Girl's High School. But the chairperson of the student council orders Miho to participate in the national Sensha-do championship.


---

description.pl: Na świecie operacja czołgami (Sensha-do) jest jedną z tradycyjnych sztuk walki, szczególnie dla dziewcząt. Miho nie lubi Sensha-do i przenosi się do liceum Oarai Girl's High School. Jednak Przewodnicząca Samorządu Uczniowskiego nakazuje Miho wziąć udział w krajowych mistrzostwach Sensha-do.---Oficjalne wydanie:- Wydanie indonezyjskie przez Elex Media (2015)

description.en:
MazinSaga is a manga written and produced by Go Nagai between 1990 and 1998; currently incomplete and up to the sixth volume, it's the summa of Nagai's works, for the complexity of the plot and the treated thematic content.  
Mazinsaga tells the story of the young Koji Kabuto, university student who finds himself having to collect the fruit of the researches of his father, physicist of world-wide reputation who died in mysterious circumstances.  
The boy is thus given a powerful artifact, Mazinger Z, the Armor of God.

description.en: After growing up in Africa, Fade moves to France to live with her uncle, but her headstrong personality means they cannot get along. However, she soon becomes involved in the fashion industry, making various friends and enemies along the way to success!

description.en:
This is no different from ordinary villager life...
"There can be no one stronger than me in this world!"
To become the strongest, Yuria, the Sea Queen, went ashore in search of the Demon King. But when she looked at her reflection, she saw the face of a child. In exchange for her legs, she lost all her strength... Even so, still striving to become the strongest, Yuria begins a painful journey!

[ "Hanya saja... aku jadi tidak ada bedanya dengan penduduk desa..." ] "Tidak boleh ada makhluk yang lebih kuat dariku di dunia ini!" Untuk menjadi yang terkuat, Yuria, Raja Lautan, datang ke daratan untuk mencari Raja Iblis terkuat. Namun, saat melihat ke cermin, dia melihat wajah anak kecil...? Sebagai ganti kaki, dia telah kehilangan seluruh kekuatannya. Meskipun begitu, ia masih mengincar posisi teratas di dunia! Perjalanannya yang penuh air mata dimulai!

description.ru:
Это… Ничем не отличается от деревенской жизни... В этом мире не может быть существа сильнее меня!” Чтобы стать сильнейшей, Юрия, Морская Королева, вышла на сушу в поисках Короля Демонов. Но… Посмотрев на свое отражение, она увидела лицо ребенка... В обмен на ноги она потеряла все свои силы... Даже так, все еще стремясь стать сильнейшей, начинается мучительное путешествие Юрии!

description.zh:
深海女王无奈变成小孩？
落魄海王的陆地称霸之旅！
大海之王友丽亚为了称霸天下，特地上岸来到陆地上寻找魔王一决胜负。可上岸后才发现，自己失去了所有的力量，而且还变成了小孩子？为了称霸天下，友丽亚辛酸的崭新旅程就此拉开帷幕！

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)

altTitles.ja: フツウーの恋って何？
フツーの恋って何？

description.en:
**Is my "red string of fate" connected to you?**

The high school first year "me" that fell in love at first sight at the school entrance ceremony. But that love was not normal...
A yuri story depicted from the point of view of three high school girls.
description.ja:
**私の赤い“糸”はあなたと繋がってますか？**

高校一年生の入学式に一目惚れしてしまった「わたし」。でもその恋は普通ではなかった…。
３人の女子高生の視点で描かれた百合物語。

title.en: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo, Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de, Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu o Mezashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
description.ja: 廃人ゲーマーの会社員“俺”は、やり込んだVRMMO「ダンエク」の世界に転移した。しかし転移先は悪役のデブキャラで!?

altTitles.ja: サンドランド フルカラー版

description.en: In the far future, war has destroyed the entire Earth, leaving only a barren wasteland where the supply of water is controlled by the greedy king. In search of a long-lost lake, Sheriff Rao asked the king of the demons for help...and got the king's son, Beelzebub, and his assistant, Thief. Together the unlikely trio sets off across the desert, facing dragons, bandits and the deadliest foe of all... the King's army itself! It's travel adventure and tank action in this new story from Akira Toriyama, the creator of Dragon Ball Z!

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

description.en: After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

altTitles.ja: 7日間限定彼女

altTitles.th: แฟนสาวแค่ 7 วัน

description.en:
A yuri romantic comedy centered on a temporary relationship between a gal and an honor student. 

The story begins when Manatsu, a gal who is on the verge of repeating a grade, starts receiving tutoring from Sumie, an honor student. Manatsu loves shoujo manga and romantic gossip but has the vague that having a boyfriend somehow doesn't fit her. 

When she casually brings this up, Sumie suggests, "Why not try starting with just the form?" and offers "How about dating me for just 7 days?"

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

altTitles.th: คุณอันโจ หยอกนักเพราะรักนะ

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?

**Official English:** [emaqi - USA & Canada only](https://emaqi.com/manga/anjo-the-mischievous-gal)
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

altTitles.ja: ギャルにぱちゃんはせまられたい

altTitles.en: Gal niPA-chan Wants to be Hit On

altTitles.th: นุ้งแกลนิป้าอยากโดนจับกดจังเลยค่า!

description.en: The popular teen model niPA, aka Asahino Futaba, is strong willed and independent, but the plain guy who is her seatmate refuses to budge before her... "Damn that four-eyed loser, how dare he tell me off!". However, at the same time, remembering that makes her feel somehow strange. Her fingers slip beneath her skirt as if by reflex and while thinking about getting assaulted by that disgusting man, she pleasures herself against her better judgment while she is brought to climax in her fantasies!?
description.id: Futaba Asahino dikenal sebagai model remaja populer niPA.  Dia memiliki kepribadian yang tidak bisa digoda orang, tapi laki-laki berkaca mata yang duduk disebelahnya, secara tidak sengaja melihatnya colmek.
description.ja: 大人気ティーンズモデルniPAこと、朝日野二葉。人に媚びない強気な性格の彼女だけど、隣の席の地味な男は一歩も引かなくて…。クソザコメガネに注意されてマジむかつくんだけど!!　でも同時に、思い出したら変な気分になってきちゃって。彼女の指先は自然とスカートの中へ。あんなキモい男にせまられる妄想をしながらひとりえっちしちゃうなんでどうかしてると思いながらも、妄想の中ではしっかりイカされてしまい！？
description.th: เรื่องราวของสาวแกลขี้มโนกับหนุ่มแว่นจืดจาง... จะเกิดอะไรขึ้นเมื่อสาวแกลคนดังของโรงเรียนเกิดมีอารมณ์ "อย่างว่า" กับหนุ่มแว่นจืดจางที่นั่งข้างๆ ถ้ามันเก็บไว้ไม่ไหว ก็ระเบิดออกมาที่โรงเรียนซะเลย!

title.en: Weile Fuhuo Anlian De Shi Zun Wo Bei Po Kaile Hougong

altTitles.zh: 为了复活暗恋的师尊我被迫开了后宫

altTitles.zh-ro: Wèile Fùhuó Ànliàn De Shī Zūn Wǒ Bèi Pò Kāile Hòugōng

altTitles.en: I Was Forced to Open a Harem to Resurrect the Master I Had a Crush on

description.zh: 花樱樱一朝穿成小孤女，命悬一线之时，天降仙女师尊，救她于水火。 于是花樱樱日日撩夜夜追，终于舔化冰山，只等师尊渡劫成功就能双宿双修，双宿双飞…… 谁成想师尊居然渡劫失败，碎成了渣渣！ 为了复活师尊，花樱樱穿梭七重镜界，要和七个不同身份的切片师尊酱酱酿酿，水乳交融！ 花樱樱捏拳，无奈道：开后宫什么的，都是为了拯救师尊呐！

description.en:
In a world torn between the Sky and the Lands, siblings Mia and Sera embark on a quest to reunite with the only family they have ever known—Mother Theresa.
Separated by fate, their journey is filled with surprises, wonder, and sorrow.
As they traverse breathtaking landscapes and encounter both friends and foes, they must confront their deepest fears, discover the power of love and hope, and learn to believe in themselves.

Yet hidden within Mia lies a secret that could change their fate—and the fate of the entire world.

altTitles.ja: ミックス

description.en:
Adachi's second serialization in Gessan Shounen Sunday, follows the story of three siblings, students of Meisei Middle School. Takes place 26 years after Adachi's biggest title, Touch.  
  
Because of the legend left by Tatsuya Uesugi, Meisei Academy High School was well-known for their strong baseball team. But 26 years after their glory, the team has not been able to keep their record and has since lost their fame.  
  
Two stepbrothers, Souichirou and Touma Tachibana, aim to revive of the once-strong Meisei Academy baseball team and enter the National High School Baseball Championship.  
  
(Source: MAL, edited)
description.ja: 舞台は明青学園。同年同月同日に生まれた同い年の兄弟とひとつ違いの妹。上杉兄弟の伝説から２６年、運命の兄弟は今再び明青学園の扉を開く。そして、物語は始まる―――

title.en: Dainana Maouji Jilbagias no Maou Keikokuki

altTitles.ja: 第七魔王子ジルバギアスの魔王傾国記

altTitles.en: Zilbagias the Demon Prince: How the Seventh Prince Brought Down the Kingdom
Seventh Demon Prince Jilbagias' Chronicle of Overthrowing the Demon Kingdom
7th Demon Prince Jilbagias, the Demon Kingdom Destroyer

description.en:
The hero Alexander and his comrades unleash a daring raid on the Demon King’s castle, intent on assassinating him and bringing an end to the war against the darkness in one fell swoop. However, the raid goes awry when his party is effortlessly decimated by the Demon King’s overwhelming power.

But death is not the end of the road for Alexander, as he is reincarnated two years later as that very same Demon King’s son. With the memories of his past life still intact, he vows to use his miraculous second chance to continue fighting—this time destroying the demonic kingdom from within as the Demon Prince Zilbagias.

It doesn’t take long for his mettle to be tested either, as passing as a young demon prince without blowing his cover proves to be quite a bit more challenging than he initially anticipated.

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/zilbagias-the-demon-prince-how-the-seventh-prince-brought-down-the-kingdom)
description.fr: Alexandre, dont la ville natale a été détruite par la race démoniaque, s'est battu avec le Roi Démon et a été tué. Mais au lieu d'être accueilli dans l'au-delà, lorsqu'il ouvre les yeux, il renaît sous les traits du fils du roi des démons, Jilbagias ? Tout en cachant sa véritable identité, il se souille les mains d'atrocités en se conduisant comme le prince démon idéal, augmentant son pouvoir pour finalement renverser le royaume des démons...

title.en: BanG Dream! - AnoSoyo Are Already Dating (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 超人X

description.en:
When an airplane goes down in a plume of black smoke near their city, best friends Tokio and Azuma join the volunteer search and rescue team. But instead of a wreck of twisted metal, they discover that the plane suffered minimal damage and that over 200 of the passengers are still alive! With their services no longer needed, the friends head for home, but on the way, they run into an old enemy who has picked up some bizarre new powers and an obsession with destroying them. Now Tokio and Azuma only have one chance to make it out alive—by becoming the superpowered creatures known as choujin!

Being a superpowered creature isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Tokio has to hide his transformation from his family and dodge a truancy charge at school, all while dealing with an increasing number of odd incidents happening around town!
description.fr:
En 1998, suite à la multiplication de surhumains appelés “choujin“, le monde a été divisé en provinces autonomes. Cinquante ans après, un crash aérien va changer à tout jamais le destin de la jeune Ely, cultivatrice de “tomeïto“, et impacter le paisible quotidien des lycéens Tokio Kurohara et Azuma Higashi, qui jouent aux justiciers face aux petits malfrats de quartier…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Glénat**
description.hu:
Amikor egy repülőgép lezuhan miközben egy különös, fekete füstöt ereget, a két jó barát Tokio és Azuma úgy dönt, hogy csatlakozik az önkéntes kutató és mentőcsapathoz. Azonban egy csomó roncs helyett azt látják, hogy a repülő minimális károkat szenvedett valamint több mint 200 utas túlélte a balesetet. De mivel nem volt szükség már rájuk így elindulnak hazafelé. Viszont az úton szembejön velük egy régi ellenségük, aki valami bizar erő birtokosa lett, és elakarja pusztítani őket. Tokio és Azuma egyetlen esélye a túlélésre az, hogy szupererővel rendelkező lényekké - Úgy nevezett Choujin-okká válnak.

De a szupererő nem megoldás mindenre. Tokio-nak titokban kell tartania az erejét a családja, és iskolája elől, miközben egyre több különös esemény történik városszerte.
description.ja: 黒煙を上げ墜落していく飛行機が目撃された。それはどうやら“超人”によって引き起こされたものらしい。しかし、不思議なことにその事故は機体の損傷も少なく、何より生存者が「200名」もいた。高校生の黒原トキオと東アヅマは事故処理のボランティアの帰り、因縁の不良にいきなり絡まれるが…いつもと何か様子がちがう――
description.ru:
Азума Хигаши довольно популярный парень. И хотя он не очень крупный, но обладает хорошими боевыми навыками и сильным чувством справедливости. Также он имеет высочайшие оценки в своём классе. Прямая противоположность Азуме его друг Токио Курохара, который не слишком увлечён учёбой. Даже во время драк он выступает как простой наблюдатель. Тем не менее, невзирая на сложности и различия, эти два закадычных приятеля держатся друг друга.
Оба парня живут в префектуре Ямато – самом обычном регионе страны, который более всего известен тем, что некоторые его области были уничтожены Сверхчеловеком.
description.uk:
Азума Хіґаші доволі популярний хлопець: низенький красень із гарними бойовими навичками, має підвищене почуття справедливості, найкращі оцінки у класі та друга… свою повну протилежність - Токіо Курохару, боязкого хлопчака, який лиш спостерігає за бійками Азуми та ловить ґав на уроках. І все ж, не зважаючи на це, міці їхньої дружби можна позаздрити.

Префектура Ямато, район, де вони живуть, наполовину зруйнований Надлюдьми - особами із небезпечними надприродними здібностями. Часто саме вони влаштовують погроми чи сутички, в центрі яких цього разу й опинился хлопці. Перед загрозою смерті друзі приймають рішення стати Надлюдьми. Зміни торкаються Токіо, який вже не може бути стороннім спостерігачем, він потрапляє у пастку світу, де битва неминуча.
description.vi: Một tác phẩm mới được khắc họa dưới ngòi bút của tác giả bộ manga đình đám tokyo ghoul. "Siêu nhân X" kể về thế giới có những nhân vật đặc biệt được gọi là "Siêu nhân"[Choujin], nhân vật chính là Tokio Kurobara, một học sinh trung học ở tỉnh Yamato, hiện tại cậu ấy cùng người bạn Higashi Azuma thực thi công lý.Và rồi một ngày nọ, khi cả hai rơi vào tình thế hiểm nghèo bắt buộc chỉ còn cách dùng một ống tiêm kỳ lạ...
description.es-la: Azuma Higashi es un chico bastante popular. Aunque puede ser algo pequeño, tiene fuertes habilidades de lucha y sus calificaciones son las mejores de su clase. Esto es lo opuesto a Tokio Kurohara, su amigo que no escucha en clase y es simplemente un espectador mientras Azuma pelea. No obstante, el vínculo de estos dos amigos de la infancia es fuerte, sin importar cuán diferentes sean. Los dos viven en la prefectura de Yamato, un distrito increíblemente ordinario con algunas áreas destruidas por Choujin. Los choujin son humanos con poderes sobrenaturales y peligrosos, a menudo la causa de la destrucción circundante. Mientras regresaban a casa, Tokio y Azuma se encuentran con un Choujin, que amenaza con matarlos. Sin posibilidad de escapar, Tokio y Azuma toman una decisión crucial: convertirse en Choujin. Con estos nuevos poderes adquiridos, Tokio ya no puede ser el espectador que alguna vez fue, ahora atrapado en un mundo donde la lucha es inevitable.

title.en: Magabanashi: Ghost Stories Spreading on Social Media

altTitles.ja: 禍話: SNSで伝播する令和怪談

altTitles.ja-ro: Magabanashi: SNS de Denpa suru Reiwa Kaidan

description.en: Based on the popular horror radio show Magabanashi, this anthology captures supernatural stories that have taken on a life of their own across social media. Readers are cautioned that these tales come with risks, as they tap into deep-seated fears and blur the line between reality and the supernatural.

title.en: Moto Saikyou Kouryakusha, Nozomanu Dungeon Haishin de Musou shite Shimasu

altTitles.ja: 元最強攻略者、望まぬダンジョン配信で無双してしまう〜コーチの依頼をしてきたのは大人気アイドルでした〜

altTitles.id: Mantan penakluk terkuat, tak tertandingi dalam menghasilkan suara yang tidak diinginkan

description.en:
The dawn of dungeon conquering. A group of boys who were once known as the strongest party is wiped out in an accident. Five years have passed since then. 

Low-difficulty dungeons have been developed as leisure facilities, and dungeon conquering has become a popular content that video streamers have flocked to join. In order to survive the tough world of showbiz, current top idol Shinonome Kanami also decides to become a broadcaster who seriously conquers dungeons. The man introduced by her sponsor as the best mentor is a rather unreliable-looking man, Amano Fuyuki.

However, when they visit a dungeon together, an incident occurs right away, putting them in a desperate situation –!?
description.ja:
ダンジョン攻略黎明期。かつて最強のパーティと呼ばれた少年たちは、ある事故をきっかけに壊滅する。それから5年。

低難易度ダンジョンはレジャー施設として整備され、ダンジョン攻略は動画配信者たちもこぞって参入する人気コンテンツとなっていた。現役のトップアイドル、東雲かなみも厳しい芸能界を生き抜くために、ダンジョンのガチ攻略配信者になることを決意する。スポンサーから最高の指導役として紹介されたのは、どうも頼りなさそうな男、天野冬稀。

しかも一緒に訪れたダンジョンでは早速ハプニングが発生して絶体絶命―！？

altTitles.ja: 私のこと、寝取ってみせて

description.en: Kurashiro Shion is a pathetic high school boy who acts like a cuck, obsessively pining after Kira Hinano, the arrogant and manipulative bitch of their class. Kira exploits Kurashiro’s loneliness through shared hobbies, toying with his feelings. When Kurashiro confesses his love, Kira coldly reveals she already has a boyfriend, ruthlessly crushing his self-esteem and dismissing him callously. Left devastated and isolated, Kurashiro remains broken while Kira continues her superficial popularity without remorse.

title.en: The White Mage Who was Banished from the Hero's Party is Picked up by an S Rank Adventurer: This White Mage is Too Out of the Ordinary!

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティーを追放された白魔導師、Sランク冒険者に拾われる ～この白魔導師が規格外すぎる～

altTitles.en: The White Mage Who was Banished from the Hero's Party is Picked up by an S Rank Adventurer: This White Mage is Too Out of the Ordinary!

altTitles.fr: La nouvelle vie du mage blanc

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha Party wo Tsuihousareta Shiro Madoushi, S Rank Boukensha ni Hirowareru ~Kono Shiro Madoushi ga Kikakugai Sugiru~

description.en: One day, Lloyd, a white mage, is banished from the hero’s party. Lloyd, who has lost his job, happens to accompany an S-rank party on a quest by chance. At that time, no one knew that the hero’s party would collapse and Lloyd would gain fame - yet. This is the story of an extraordinary support magic-user who thinks he is normal, becomes an adventurer, while he is unaware of how he eventually becomes peerless.
description.ja: 「実力不足の白魔導師は要らない」　白魔導師であるロイドはある日、勇者パーティーを追放されてしまう。職を失ってしまったロイドだったが、たまたまSランクパーティーのクエストに同行することになる。この時はまだ、勇者パーティーが崩壊し、ロイドが名声を得ていくことを知る者はいなかった――。自分では普通だと思っているロイドは、無自覚に無双する！
description.pt-br: Um dia, Lloyd, um mago branco, é banido da festa do herói. Lloyd, que perdeu o emprego, por acaso acompanha um grupo de rank S em uma missão. Naquela época, ninguém sabia que o partido do herói entraria em colapso e Lloyd ganharia fama - ainda. Esta é a história de um extraordinário usuário de magia de suporte que pensa que é normal, torna-se um aventureiro, embora não saiba como eventualmente se torna incomparável.

title.en: Class no Inkya Ojousama no Shitsuji ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: クラスの陰キャお嬢様の執事になりました

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Inkya Ojou-sama no Shitsuji ni Narimashita

altTitles.en: I Became the Butler of the Gloomy Young Lady in My Class

altTitles.es-la: Me Convertì en el Mayordomo de la Señorita Amargada de mi Clase

description.en:
My family abandoned me in the night leaving me behind, so I became the butler of the gloomy young lady in my class...

---

description.ja:
家族が夜逃げし行き場をなくした主人公を拾ったのはクラスの陰キャお嬢様！
執事として尽くすうちに少しずつ絆が芽生え、一人ぼっちですさんでいたお嬢様の外見や態度にも変化が…？
